Package bits

Provides the classes necessary to specify a satisfiability problem involving individual boolean variables and boolean literals.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBitString
    The IBitString interface must be implemented by any class definition of BitString contemplated as an alternative to the BitString class provided by this package.
    IBooleanLiteral
    The IBooleanLiteral interface must be implemented by any class definition of BooleanLiteral contemplated as an alternative to the BooleanLiteral class provided by this package.
    IBooleanVariable
    The IBooleanVariable interface must be implemented by any class definition of BooleanVariable contemplated as an alternative to the BooleanVariable class provided by this package.
    IClause
    The IClause interface must be implemented by any class definition of Clause contemplated as an alternative to the Clause class provided by this package.
    INaturalNumber
    The INaturalNumber interface must be implemented by any class definition of NaturalNumber contemplated as an alternative to the NaturalNumber class provided by this package.
    IProblem
    The IProblem interface must be implemented by any class definition of Problem contemplated as an alternative to the Problem class provided by this package.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlternativeDenial
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the alternative denial (also called the NAND or Sheffer stroke) of several given IProblems.
    BitAnder
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitArrayPartition
    For example, suppose partition is as follows: ____________|__0___1___2___3___4_
    BitArraySingleClearer
    For any positive integer n, if X_0, X_1, X_2, ...
    BitArraySingleSetter
    For any positive integer n, if X_0, X_1, X_2, ...
    BitEqualityIndicator
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitEqualizer
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitExclusiveSelector
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitFixer
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean constraint.
    BitInequalityIndicator
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitNander
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitNoter
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitOrderer
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitOrer
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on three IBooleanVariables.
    BitShefferStroker
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitUnequalizer
    An extension of the Problem class which imposes a Boolean relation on two IBooleanVariables.
    BitXnorer
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean function.
    BitXorer
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Boolean function.
    BooleanLiteral
    A class which represents a Boolean literal.
    BooleanVariable
    A class which represents a Boolean variable.
    Clause
    A class which represents a satisfiability clause.
    ClauseDenier
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the denial of a given IClause.
    ConditionalConjunction
    Returns an IProblem that is satisfied if and only if all of the following IProblems are satisfied:
    ConditionalDisjunction
    Returns an IProblem that is satisfied if and only if at least one of the following IProblems is satisfied:
    Conjunction
    An extension of the Problem class which creates a new IProblem object from a collection of IProblem objects that will be satisfied if and only if all of the original IProblems are satisfied.
    Disjunction
    Returns an IProblem that is satisfied if and only at least one of the IProblems passed to it as parameters is satisfied.
    EquivalenceRelation
    Implements the concept of an equivalence relation R over a set of elements X.
    ExclusiveDisjunction
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the exclusive disjunction of two given IProblems.
    FredkinGater
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Fredkin gate.
    KSatReader
    A reader which is created using an object of type positronic.satisfiability.elements.ISolver and has a method parseInstance which translates a positronic.satisfiability.elements.IProblem object into a corresponding org.sat4j.specs.IProblem object.
    Partition
    TBS
    Problem
    A class which represents a collection of IClause objects, and which amounts to a satisfiability problem.
    ProblemBitLinker
    This class links the value of an IBooleanVariable to the truth value of a given IProblem.
    ProblemDenier
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the denial of a given IProblem.
    ProblemDifferencer
    An extension of the Problem class which expresses the logical difference of two given IProblems.
    ProblemPair
    A wrapper class which encloses two IProblems.
    ThreeBitAdder
    An extension of the IProblem class which performs an add with carry of three BooleanVariables.
    ToffoliGater
    An extension of the Problem class which implements a Toffoli gate.
    TwoBitAdder
    An extension of the IProblem class which performs an add with carry of two BooleanVariables.

Package bits Description

Provides the classes necessary to specify a satisfiability problem involving individual boolean variables and boolean literals.
Since:
2004/08/26
